ch0160_40_suiren/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’m glad you’re well.
ch0160_40_suiren/0101_0701_02_10: Shall we go fishing for a big catch?
ch0160_40_suiren/7101_0701_01_10: Mallow said this outfit’s cute, like a doll’s.
ch0160_40_suiren/7101_0701_02_10:
That made me happy. I’m quite fond of
this design.
ch0160_40_suiren/7102_0701_01_10:
If there were a god of fishing, what do you
think it’d look like?
ch0160_40_suiren/7102_0701_02_10: Maybe it’d look like a Water-type Pokémon!
ch0160_40_suiren/7103_0701_01_10:
When you’re fishing out at sea, keep an eye
out for Wingull!
ch0160_40_suiren/7103_0701_02_10:
Fishermen know to look for Wingull circling
in the sky, as below them, the ocean’s bound
to be teeming with fish Pokémon.
ch0160_40_suiren/7104_0701_01_10:
Wild Dondozo apparently team up with a
smaller Pokémon, Tatsugiri, to catch prey.
ch0160_40_suiren/7104_0701_02_10:
When it hunts, Tatsugiri feigns weakness to
lure in prey.
ch0160_40_suiren/7104_0701_04_10:
A Pokémon trying to fish... It sounds silly,
but it’s true!
ch0160_40_suiren/7105_0701_01_10:
It’s the start of a new year, so I want to
reel in a big, lively catch!
ch0160_40_suiren/7105_0701_02_10:
Would you like to go fishing with
me to kick off the new year,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0160_40_suiren/1701_0701_02_10: I have something to give you.
ch0160_40_suiren/1701_0702_01_10:
With this, I’ll have you hooked in no time!
*chuckle* Just kidding.
ch0160_40_suiren/2501_0701_01_10:
You can fish anytime you like, but there’s
something different about the early morning
when the sky is just turning white.
ch0160_40_suiren/2501_0701_02_10:
Morning is when things start getting lively
underwater.
ch0160_40_suiren/2501_0702_01_10:
One of the fun parts of fishing is waiting for
a bite.
ch0160_40_suiren/2501_0702_02_10:
Seeing the sun pop up over the horizon
while I’m fishing reminds me of a fond
memory of my family.
ch0160_40_suiren/2511_0701_01_10: Many people take on new-year challenges.
ch0160_40_suiren/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d like to make a fishing spot somewhere
I’ve never been before!
ch0160_40_suiren/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m sure I’ll find a huge catch.
The biggest I’ve ever seen!
ch0160_40_suiren/2511_0702_01_10:
There are likely many fishing spots around
the world I don’t know about yet.
ch0160_40_suiren/2511_0702_02_10:
If you know a good one, promise me you’ll
tell me!
ch0160_40_suiren/3001_0701_01_10:
Soaking up the morning sun makes me feel
like a new beginning is upon us. Let’s do our
best today!
ch0160_40_suiren/3003_0701_01_10:
With this dazzling outfit on, I have a feeling
I’ll reel in a big one!
ch0160_40_suiren/3005_0701_01_10:
Fishing at night has its own appeal, but
please be safe and only do it with an adult.
